cookieText: This learning environment uses H5P content that may embed YouTube videos via iFrames. Third-party cookies (especially from YouTube/Google) may be set, even though we generally use privacy-enhanced mode. Since the content embedded in H5P comes from external sources, we cannot completely rule out that personal data (e.g., IP address) may be transmitted to third-party providers. By giving your consent, you allow the use of this external content and the associated data processing. You can withdraw your consent at any time. For more information, please see our privacy policy.
